name: 100 Colorful Balls - 100s of Hours of Fun!
name_original: 100 Colorful Balls - 100s of Hours of Fun!
description:
100 Balls of Color is an easy yet very addicting game. Simply tap and hold to release the colorful balls into the rotating cups without losing any! See how long you can last in this simple one touch game! Games don't take more than five minutes (unless you're super awesome!) so play them whenever, wherever you are!

As the game goes on, different colored cups will appear. Balls dropped in colored cups will change color and are worth more points! The game ends if you lose all the cups or balls!

Some Awesome Features:
• 3 Different Game Modes!
• Realistic physics engine!
• Single tap control!
• Quick games!
• Leaderboards!
• Awesome sounds and music!

Whether you're looking for the next viral game or just looking for a fun time-waster, this game is for you! Download it today!
